scripts.preinstall: cargo binstall cargo-binstall cargo-run-bin -y && cargo bin --install
scripts.postinstall: node scripts/setup-path.ts && pnpm exec playwright install-deps
scripts.rustup:install: rustup toolchain install nightly --profile minimal --component clippy --component rustfmt --component llvm-tools-preview
scripts.rustup: pnpm run rustup:update && pnpm run rustup:install && pnpm run rustup:binstall && cargo clean
scripts.check: pnpm run check:biome && pnpm run check:taplo && pnpm run check:markdownlint && pnpm run check:clippy && pnpm run check:rustfmt && pnpm run check:zizmor
scripts.fix: pnpm run fix:biome && pnpm run fix:taplo && pnpm run fix:markdownlint && pnpm run fix:clippy && pnpm run fix:rustfmt && pnpm run fix:zizmor
scripts.check-updates: pnpm run check-updates:pnpm && pnpm run check-updates:cargo
scripts.update:pnpm: pnpm update --recursive --workspace && pnpm audit --fix && pnpm install
scripts.update:cargo: cargo cache --autoclean && cargo clean && cargo update
scripts.update: pnpm run update:pnpm && pnpm run update:cargo
